bill.title: Provides for the Unborn Child Protection from Dismemberment Abortion Act
bill.description: Provides for the Unborn Child Protection from Dismemberment Abortion Act

history.action: Read by title, under the rules, referred to the Committee on Health and Welfare.
Read by title, ordered engrossed, passed to 3rd reading.
Read third time by title, amended, roll called on final passage, yeas 83, nays 0. Finally passed, title adopted, ordered to the Senate.
Received in the Senate. Read first time by title and placed on the Calendar for a second reading.
Read second time by title and referred to the Committee on Health and Welfare.
Read by title and referred to the Legislative Bureau.
Reported without Legislative Bureau amendments. Read by title and passed to third reading and final passage.
Read by title, passed by a vote of 36 yeas and 2 nays, and ordered returned to the House. Motion to reconsider tabled.
Received from the Senate without amendments.
Enrolled and signed by the Speaker of the House.
Signed by the President of the Senate.
Sent to the Governor for executive approval.
Signed by the Governor. Becomes Act No. 264.
